video:video.video:title: Easy Deploy FreeBSD from VM Depot
video:video.video:description: Use the Easy Deploy feature of VM Depot to create a FreeBSD virtual machine in just a few minutes. You will need an active Azure subscription, you can get a one month free trial to get you started.
